problem.heading: Job searching shouldn't be a second job.
problem.description: You spend hours browsing dozens of job sites, opening endless tabs, adapting resumes for each position, and still miss opportunities that come up when you're not looking. It's frustrating, time-consuming, and inefficient.
problem.promiseHeading: Reclaim your time. Apply with intelligence.
problem.promiseDescription: scrapJobs automates your entire job search, monitoring your favorite companies 24/7 and sending smart alerts with AI analysis. Focus your energy on what really matters: preparing for interviews.

security.question: Is my resume data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use end-to-end encryption and follow security best practices. Your data is never shared with third parties and you have full control over your information.

ai.question: How does the AI analysis work?
ai.answer: Our AI compares the job's keywords and requirements with your resume's skills and experiences, generating a compatibility score and personalized suggestions to improve your chances.

cancel.question: Can I cancel at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, no hassle. There are no cancellation fees or grace periods.

limits.question: How many companies can I monitor?
limits.answer: It depends on your plan! The Beta Tester plan allows up to 3 sites, Professional up to 15, and Premium up to 50 sites.
